<span class="grit">Hot Tip</span>
=================================

Deets[over 1 year ago](https://wesbos.com/tip/intl-datetimeformat-date-formatting "View Tip Details")

Tweet

üî• Use Intl.DateTimeFormat() to create nicely formatted date and time strings

[**‚Üê Prev**](https://wesbos.com/tip/intl-pluralrules-ordinal/)

üî• Use Intl.PluralRules() to easily find the ordinal for numbers - 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th...

[**Next ‚Üí**](https://wesbos.com/tip/intl-relativetimeformat-format-dates/)

üî• Use Intl.RelativeTimeFormat() to get nicely formatted relative time strings.
